summary: Based on the novel by Nathaniel Hawthorne, this classic film follows a family feud between two brothers and an ancient curse that haunts them.
cast: George Sanders|Margaret Lindsay|Vincent Price|Dick Foran|Nan Grey|Cecil Kellaway|Alan Napier|Gilbert Emery|Miles Mander|Charles Trowbridge|Hal Budlong|Caroline Frances Cooke|Harry Cording|Kernan Cripps|Robert Dudley|Martin Faust|Margaret Fealy|Sibyl Harris|Ellis Irving|P.J. Kelly|Colin Kenny|Ann Kunde|Jane Loofbourrow|Murdock MacQuarrie|Michael Mark|Nelson McDowell|Mira McKinney|Edgar Norton|Lon Poff|Russ Powell|Allen D. Sewall|Jack C. Smith|Hugh Sothern|Harry Stubbs|Claire Whitney|Harry Woods
title: Siete torres
